title: Metropolis Extras: 2 Documentarys DvDrip
description:
*The Metropolis Case  Duration: 0:43:52 Spoken Language-English
 
'The Metropolis Case' is a very decent 45-minute documentary that offers a detailed profile of Lang and German Expressionism, and considers the source of the film's enduring appeal. Along the way there's ample discussion of the film's spectacular design complete with original sketches and notes, and Patelas' own insights into Lang's method and Metropolis' significance. 


*Metropolis-The Restoration  Duration: 0:08:49  Spoken Language-German 

Nine minute documentary 'The Restoration' explains how this new cut of the film was assembled from existing negatives and compares key scenes as they appear in earlier versions. Also available here is an extensive gallery complete with stills from missing scenes, early design sketches and posters. Lang, his cinematographer Karl Freund and eleven other members of the cast and crew get comprehensive biographies and there's an extensive array of miscellaneous information
